title: My game has stop working! D:
body: i had to uninstall my game for technical issues, and i tried to re-install it, but it won't load the application files! plz tell me how to fix it!

replies.body:
Hey fiveslash!

That sounds awful!  However, I am a little confused by what you mean when you say it won't load the application files.  Could you please be more specific in what you mean?  Is it possible that you can provide a screenshot of the exact error message that you receive?

I look forward to helping you!
